channel.title: Is there a way tostop one itemers?
channel.description: ive seen some servers online, with anti one itemers thats means you need atleast 3 items able to pk (attack player) someone heard that?

item.title: Is there a way tostop one itemers?
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

i know but no one answering… :S so no one can help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way tostop one itemers?

item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

[quote=“codyganzell, post:2, topic:236437”][quote author=sabsabi link=topic=312014.msg2486910#msg2486910 date=1223904807]
ive seen some servers online, with anti one itemers thats means you need atleast 3 items able to pk (attack player)
someone heard that?
[/quote]
This is like your 3rd thread with this question…[/quote]
He is right in what he’s saying, you should only make one topic.

item.title: Is there a way tostop one itemers?
item.dc:creator: @sabsabi sabsabi
item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

like enkrona server exemple has it … on enkrona you cant pk less then 3 items , exemple : u try to one item and u attack it say “You cannot pk less then 3 items,”
and you cant attack when your less then 3 items,

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way tostop one itemers?
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

I know people make it so they have to have something equipped on there body, legs and a weapon but i dont have the code myself So i cant help i’ll take a look though.

And the warn thing is bad its like the GS mini on most Czars “PK here and your banned!!” and i guarantee someone will go and PK there because its a Private Server they dont really lose much if they get banned or not, so you have to make so they cant do whatever.

item.title: Is there a way tostop one itemers?
item.dc:creator: @codyganzell codyganzell
item.description:
@codyganzell wrote:

[quote=“sabsabi, post:3, topic:236437”][quote author=codyganzell link=topic=312014.msg2486948#msg2486948 date=1223909078]

ive seen some servers online, with anti one itemers thats means you need atleast 3 items able to pk (attack player)
someone heard that?

This is like your 3rd thread with this question…
[/quote]

stfu, i can ask what i want[/quote]

Easy there killer, I didn’t say you couldn’t ask, I was just implying the fact you shouldn’t make multiple threads in order to ask one question. I believe thats spam. Don’t get your panties in a bunch next time dude. Was just wishful thinking…=/
